message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item for $13,500. We understand the importance of finding the right balance between value and affordability, and we hope this proposal meets your expectations.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $13,500 is still a bit high for my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  This reflects the value I see in it while staying within my price range.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to present an alternative offer for our premium product. In light of your budgetary constraints, we propose to sell the item to you for $12,000. This price reflects a compromise that maintains the value of the product while making it more accessible to you.
